All.traditionalAuthor: Unknown; David; Asaph; Sons of Korah; Moses; Solomon; Ethan; Heman

Protestant (66 Books).title: Psalms
Protestant (66 Books).traditionalAuthor: Unknown; David; Asaph; Sons of Korah; Moses; Solomon; Ethan; Heman

Protestant (66 Books).title: Matthew
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus the Messiah-King climactically fulfills the Old Testament.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Mark
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus the Messiah and Son of God is a Suffering Servant and a model for his followers.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Luke
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus the Messiah fulfills God’s plan by seeking and saving the lost.

Protestant (66 Books).title: John
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus the Messiah and Son of God gives eternal life to everyone who believes in him.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Acts
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus the Messiah continues to fulfill God’s plan by expanding the early church in the face of opposition through the Holy Spirit’s power.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Romans
Protestant (66 Books).message: The gospel reveals how God is righteously righteousing (i.e., justifying) unrighteous individuals—both Jews and Gentiles—at this stage in the history of salvation.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 1 Corinthians
Protestant (66 Books).message: The gospel requires God’s holy people to mature in purity and unity.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 2 Corinthians
Protestant (66 Books).message: God shows his power through human weakness.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Galatians
Protestant (66 Books).message: Both Jews and Gentiles are justified by (and continue to live by) faith in Christ, not by works of the law.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Ephesians
Protestant (66 Books).message: The church (both Jewish and Gentile Christians) must maintain the unity that Christ powerfully created.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Philippians
Protestant (66 Books).message: Conduct yourselves in a manner worthy of the gospe.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Colossians
Protestant (66 Books).message: Christ is supreme.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 1 Thessalonians
Protestant (66 Books).message: Walk in light of Christ’s imminent coming.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 2 Thessalonians
Protestant (66 Books).message: Persevere because the Lord Jesus Christ will return and set all things right.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 1 Timothy
Protestant (66 Books).message: The church must guard the faith by embracing godliness.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 2 Timothy
Protestant (66 Books).message: Persevere for the gospel.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Titus
Protestant (66 Books).message: Elders must faithfully teach, defend, and apply sound doctrine so that believers do what is good by God’s grace.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Philemon
Protestant (66 Books).message: Love your Christian brothers and sisters (regardless of social barriers) by valuing them above yourself.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Hebrews
Protestant (66 Books).message: Jesus is better, so persevere.

Protestant (66 Books).title: James
Protestant (66 Books).message: Faith works.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 1 Peter
Protestant (66 Books).message: Stand firm in God’s grace.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 2 Peter
Protestant (66 Books).message: Beware of false teachers.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 1 John
Protestant (66 Books).message: You can know that you have eternal life in three interlocked ways: believing in Jesus, living righteously, and loving believers.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 2 John
Protestant (66 Books).message: Walk in the truth and love by not supporting deceivers.

Protestant (66 Books).title: 3 John
Protestant (66 Books).message: Work together for the truth by supporting those who spread it.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Jude
Protestant (66 Books).message: Contend for the faith against grace-perverting immorality.

Protestant (66 Books).title: Revelation
Protestant (66 Books).message: The Lamb will consummate his kingdom for God’s glory by saving his people and judging his enemies.
